personality.title: Personality Type Test

personality.description: Take our comprehensive personality assessment to discover your MBTI type and unlock insights about your strengths, career matches, and future potential.

landing.title: Discover Your Personality Type
landing.subtitle_part1: Understand yourself better with our comprehensive MBTI assessment.
landing.subtitle_part2: Please answer honestly — there are no right or wrong answers. Your authenticity ensures the most accurate result.

landing.title: Before You Begin
landing.subtitle: Answer honestly — this test is for your self-discovery, not for judgment.
landing.description: Be as genuine as possible. Your responses are not stored or shared — they're only used to calculate your result.
landing.reminder: You'll have 10 minutes to answer 20 questions. Take a deep breath and focus — this is your moment of reflection.

calculating.title: Analyzing your results...
calculating.subtitle: Our AI is evaluating your responses. This will take a few seconds...

errors.load_questions: Failed to load questions. Please try again.
errors.load_result: Failed to load results. Please try again.

warnings.leave_page: If you leave this page, your current test progress will be lost. Continue?

excellent.title: Creative Thinker – The Innovative Mind
excellent.summary: Your creative thinking abilities are exceptional. You consistently push boundaries, see connections others miss, and transform abstract ideas into innovative solutions.
insights: You excel at connecting disparate concepts to generate novel solutions
Your ability to see beyond immediate constraints fuels breakthrough innovation
You naturally challenge assumptions and explore unconventional paths

good.title: Creative Thinker – The Adaptive Innovator
good.summary: You have strong creative thinking skills with room for growth. You can generate original ideas and see alternative perspectives, though you sometimes default to familiar patterns.
insights: You demonstrate solid creative problem-solving abilities
Expanding your comfort zone will unlock greater creative potential
You benefit from seeking diverse perspectives to enhance your ideas

developing.title: Creative Thinker – The Emerging Innovator
developing.summary: Your creative thinking is developing. You may tend toward practical, proven solutions rather than exploring novel approaches. This isn't a limitation—it's an opportunity.
insights: Focus on generating multiple solutions before choosing one
Practice seeing problems from completely different angles
Embrace experimentation and view failures as learning opportunities
